summary: When Norwegian scientist Marie attends a seminar in Paris on the actual weight of a kilo, it is her own measurement of disappointment, grief and, not least, love, that ends up on the scale.
cast: Ane Dahl Torp|Laurent Stocker|Hildegun Riise|Stein Winge|Per Christian Ellefsen|Didier Flamand|Dinara Drukarova|Daniel Drewes|Peter Hudson|Christian Erickson|Jean Donagan|Magne-Håvard Brekke|Joseph Rezwin|David Gasman|Christophe Reymond|Emile Abossolo M'bo|Miguel Eduardo Cueva|Sabine Pakora|Aurélie Bargème|Valérie Leroy|Nils Johnsen|Flora Djien|Eva Järnmark|Torsten Knippertz|Gunnar Strøm|Didier Rifle|Baptiste Taste|Alain L'Yle
title: 1001 Gram
